name: Access Request
description: Consumer requests to confirm and access personal data

name: Deletion Request
description: Consumer requests deletion of personal data

name: Data Portability Request
description: Consumer requests portable copy in usable format

name: Opt-Out Targeted Advertising
description: Consumer opts out of targeted advertising

name: Opt-Out Sale
description: Consumer opts out of sale of personal data

name: Opt-Out Profiling
description: Consumer opts out of profiling with legal effects

name: Consent for Sensitive Data
description: Controller obtains consent for sensitive data processing

name: Consumer Appeal
description: Consumer appeals controller refusal to act
